description: This file defines a React Native screen component called ItemDetailScreen for viewing and editing a single clip item. It handles fetching clip data, displaying clip details, editing a summary, and deleting the clip.

methods.name: ItemDetailScreen
methods.description: Main React component handling display, editing, and deletion of a clip item.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches clip data and updates component state.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves the updated summary for the clip via API and alerts user.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Confirms and deletes the clip item via API.
